title: Teaching Sex Education in Schools Is More Fraught Than Ever
description: Government policies targeting LGBTQ+ kids and gender self-determination are making sex-ed teachers’ jobs more difficult.
content: Krystalyn Musselman holds a worn cardboard box up to the screen on our Zoom call. Its the anonymous question box she relies on to field queries from high schoolers at Tecumseh Public Schools in south… [+14725 chars]
